document_data.name: ''One Crown Cheaply Bought''
document_data.author: [[Darra Oalthlone]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''One Crown Cheaply Bought''''' was a stage play penned by [[Darra Oalthlone]], a Playwright of [[Melvaunt]], in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents:
{{quote|Hark! I hear a curious sound
Ringing off yonder keep
'Tis not the roar of a triumphant raider
Nor yet a dying scream, but
The howling of one angry man.|Prince Maerdalan, in Act II, Scene VI}}
document_data.History: ''One Crown Cheaply Bought'' was a play of at least two acts and featured the character named Prince Maerdalan. The play was first performed in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
